tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SensorData (
  sensor_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE sensor_aggregate (
    aggregate_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    total_value FLOAT,
    total_count INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE aggregated_data (
  aggregated_id SERIAL,
  aggregation_type VARCHAR,
  aggregated_value FLOAT,
  start_time TIMESTAMP,
  end_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE hourly_data (
  hourly_id SERIAL,
  sensor_id UUID,
  sensor_type VARCHAR,
  hour_start TIMESTAMP,
  hour_end TIMESTAMP,
  total_value FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE daily_data (
  daily_id SERIAL,
  sensor_id UUID,
  sensor_type VARCHAR,
  date DATE,
  total_value FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE monthly_data (
  monthly_id SERIAL,
  sensor_id UUID,
  sensor_type VARCHAR,
  month_start DATE,
  month_end DATE,
  total_value FLOAT
);
